display.title: Rubbering up
description: Rubber is an excellent insulation material, and that's exactly what it's used for in GTCEu.
You'll want to use the &&3Alloy Smelter&&r to make &&aRubber Bars&&r. These ratios aren't particularly great, but we promise that making Rubber Bars will be much more efficient at &&7LV&&r.
&&l&&3Lore:&&r&&o In base GregTech 5 &&7(and in base GTCE)&&f, you needed to get string and black wool carpets as your first insulation material. &&8&&mThat was obviously far, far more fun.&&r
